title: Taste of Santa Barbara
body: Our Popular Culinary & Art Tour! Choose from a variety of options to customize this tour to meet your group's schedule, interests, and budget. Select from the following components: olive oil & vinegar tasting, a visit to Chocolats du Calibressan for a unique chocolate tasting experience, glass-blowing demonstration, wine tasting, wine blending, Stow house & railroad museum, the Santa Barbara historical museum, and other city sight-seeing choices. This tour promises to be one of the most memorable days of your trip to Santa Barbara, Captain Jack guarantees it!
